data.title: When does 'Outer Banks' Season 4 come out? The Season 4 cast and release date
data.meta_description: The Pogues will be back for another season of the hit summer show \
data.text:
The Pogues are back, "Outer Banks" Season 4 is on its way to your TV screen.

Filming for the season wrapped up on June 20 according to the @obx Instagram.

Series regulars including Chase Stokes, Madelyn Cline, Rudy Pankow, Madison Bailey, Johnathan Daviss, Carlacia Grant, Austin North and Drew Starkey were set to return.

Season 3 ended 18 months after the Pogues had found El Dorado, the lost city of gold. An elderly man approached the friends during the commemorative ceremony and showed them the manuscript of the infamous pirate Blackbeard. The captain's log included records of the exact locations Blackbeard's ship sailed until 1718. It seems like the Pogues will be on another treasure hunt as they search for Blackbeard's lost gold.

Here's when Season 4 of "Outer Banks" comes out, who is a part of the cast and where you can watch the newest season.

What is 'Outer Banks' about?

"Outer Banks" takes place in North Carolina where residents are divided up into the wealthy upper class or "Kooks" and the working-class locals called "Pogues." A group of teenage Pogues are determined to find what happened to their friend John B.'s father who mysteriously disappeared and search for treasure along the way.

They get into some pretty life-threatening situations and find romance in unexpected places.

Will there be a Season 4 of 'Outer Banks'?

Season 4 of "Outer Banks" was confirmed in February 2023 during a Poguelandia event to promote Season 3 of the show in Huntington Beach, California. Chase Stokes announced the news alongside other cast members.

When does 'Outer Banks' Season 4 come out?

According to Netflix, Season 4 of "Outer Banks" will be released in 2024.

When does the next season of 'Outer Banks' come out?

No other information has been put out yet on when exactly Season 4 will be out other than in 2024 but, filming wrapped around June 20.

'Outer Banks' Season 4 cast

Here is the cast for Season 4 of "Outer Banks":

Chase Stokes as John B.

Madelyn Cline as Sarah.

Rudy Pankow as JJ.

Madison Bailey as Kiara.

Johnathan Daviss as Pope.

Carlacia Grant as Cleo.

Austin North as Topper.

Drew Starkey as Rafe.

Fiona Palomo as Sofia.

J. Anthony Crane as new character Chandler Groff.

Pollyanna McIntosh as new character Dalia.

Brianna Brown as new character Hollis Robinson.

Rigo Sanchez as new character Lightner.

Mia Challis as new character Ruthie.

Danger ahead: When does 'Twisters' come out? How to watch the film starring Glen Powell and Daisy Edgar-Jones

Where to watch 'Outer Banks'?

"Outer Banks" is a Netflix original. Seasons 1-3 are available to watch now on the platform. Season 4 will also be released on Netflix.

The standard with ads plan costs $6.99 per month, the standard without ads costs $15.49 per month and the premium plan is $22.99 per month. Extra member slots can be added for $7.99 per month.

Reach the reporter at dina.kaur@arizonarepublic.com. Follow @dina_kaur on X, formerly known as Twitter.
